meanings.sent1: During his apprenticeship, he learned valuable skills from his mentor.

meanings.definition: The system of training a new generation of practitioners of a trade or profession through on-the-job training and often some accompanying study.
meanings.sent1: The company offers a comprehensive apprenticeship program for aspiring chefs.
meanings.sent2: Many young individuals choose an apprenticeship to kickstart their careers.
meanings.sent3: The robot decided to enroll in an apprenticeship to learn how to be more human-like.
meanings.sent4: Her apprenticeship was a bridge that connected her passion for art with practical skills.
meanings.sent5: The apprenticeship was a beacon of light guiding him towards mastery in his craft.
